Question: Conviva Inc. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Conviva Inc.

CES 2024 Product Highlight:

- Conviva’s Operational Data Platform redefines observability for the digital era, enabling operations teams to take instant, informed action to ensure a positive user experience and maximize revenue generation.

Specifications:

- Time-State Technology comprehensively maps and measures everything impacting the user’s experience in real-time.
- Enhancements facilitate faster viewer access to content, longer engagement, and cost-effective operations.
- Semantic mapper, metric builder, and AI Alerts optimize sign-up processes and authentication, reducing viewer churn.
- Real-time, experience-centric insights streamline content discovery, accelerating time to first play.
- Stateful metrics and AI alerts optimize streaming performance, preventing viewer loss due to poor experience.
